title: My Brother and I - function of final question

content.question: What is the primary function of the final question of the passage (Paragraph 3)?

choices.label: To convey the author's sense of lasting bitterness
To query the value of the sentiments raised earlier in the passage
To shift the tone of the narrative from anger to acceptance
To challenge the accuracy of the author's memories

content.answer: To convey the author's sense of lasting bitterness

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
